lower_impact_speed_kmh_threshold.description: The minimum speed in kmh required to deal impact damage

upper_impact_speed_kmh_threshold.description: The upper speed in kmh threshold for calculating impact damage

impact_force_threshold_multiplier.description: A multiplier to the minimum force required to stagger/damage enemies.

character_impact_absorb_multiplier.description: A multiplier for the character absorb amount. A lower value here will mean plowing through enemies where as a higher one means we stop more abruptly on impact.

dealt_lower_impact_damage.description: The base impact damage we deal to others

dealt_upper_impact_damage.description: The maximum impact damage we deal to others

dealt_lower_demolision_damage.description: The base demolision damage we deal to others

dealt_upper_demolision_damage.description: The maximum demolision damage we deal to others

dealt_lower_knockback_force.description: The base knockback force we deal to others

dealt_upper_knockback_force.description: The maximum knockback force we deal to others

self_lower_impact_speed_kmh_threshold.description: The minimum speed in kmh required to deal impact damage to ourselves

self_upper_impact_speed_kmh_threshold.description: The upper speed in kmh threshold for calculating impact damage to ourselves

self_lower_impact_damage.description: The base impact damage we deal to our self at impact

self_upper_impact_damage.description: The maximum impact damage we deal to our self at impact

destruction_impact_absorb_amount.description: The amount of impact force we will absorb as we destroy something and continue traveling through it.

lower_impact_speed_kmh_threshold_destruc.description: The minimum speed in kmh required to cause destruction damage, -1 means same as upper impact threshold

upper_impact_speed_kmh_threshold_destruc.description: The upper speed in kmh threshold for destruction damage, -1 means same as lower impact threshold

inflicted_damage_type.description: The damage type we inflict on others.

self_collision_damage_inward_threshold_d.description: The distance at which we accept inward distance comparisons to the impact position to all the closest points in the damageable zone actors to consider us damaging them.
